column1: '''''The Tolkien Diary 1999''''' was a blank diary book featuring illustrations by [[Alan Lee]].

column2:
A desk diary for 1999 containing paintings and drawings from the anniversary edition of The Hobbit.

This sumptuous week-to-view desk diary is illustrated with full colour paintings and black and white drawings from the bestselling 60th anniversary edition of The Hobbit . Designed to complement the annual Tolkien calendar, this is a diary which will appeal to Tolkien enthusiasts and art lovers of all ages.}}
